name: Quickimgur
description: *** Its completely FREE and NO ADS ***  A simple, lightweight solution to upload your image to Imgur and get its link quickly.  * Upload your image via the camera * Upload your image via local storage * Upload your image via Google Photos, Drive, etc. * Upload your image via Android Share * Upload your image via URL  * Automatic copy links when the upload has been completed * One-click to copy the image link  * Easy to search your history by the name * Easy to share image link and the original image * Easy to delete the image to Imgur  * Create categories to sort out your history (It helps to make your meme library!)  * Backup and restore all history * Sign in to account - Keep your images lifetime. - Upload the image to your album. - Manage your Imgurs image and album.  * Support create your copy link format for the forum  * More and more features in the future!
